item.title: @elonmusk: We take action against illegal content on X, including Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM), by removi...
item.description: We take action against illegal content on X, including Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM), by removing it, permanently suspending accounts, and working with local governments and law enforcement as necessary. Anyone using or prompting Grok to make illegal content will suffer the same consequences as if they upload illegal content. For more information on our policies, please refer to our help pages for our full X Rules and range of enforcement options.help.x.com/en/rules-and-poliâ€¦help.x.com/en/rules-and-poliâ€¦

item.title: @elonmusk: X wins because it has an accurate epistemology. Truth is not the product of a single authoritative p...
item.description: X wins because it has an accurate epistemology. Truth is not the product of a single authoritative process or group of people. It is evolutionary. Evolution is messy. Sometimes false information will go viral. But the truth wins in the end, and *no other process is better*. xAI will also win for the same reason: it prioritizes truth, and understands how truth is found. Truth - the mapping between thought patterns and reality - is the true magic in this world. Align with truth and flourish, or reject it and perish.

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: Alaska Airlines has announced that it is accelerating the rollout of@Starlinkin-flight Wi-Fi a...
item.description: NEWS: Alaska Airlines has announced that it is accelerating the rollout of@Starlinkin-flight Wi-Fi across its entire fleet after extremely successful performance on regional aircraft. "The decision reflects growing confidence in Starlinkâ€™s ability to deliver fast, reliable connectivity for passengers. After these promising results, Alaska has decided to fast-track its original 2026-2027 plan for fleetwide Starlink installation."
